storyInfo: Broca has just joined Rhodes Island and is clearly unwilling to trust the company. On one fateful mission, he finds himself in an argument with another operator.

attributes.content: Aosta, are we really joining this Rhodes Island organization?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: That's right, Broca. I think it's our best option.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: There's   other places we could go.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I know you aren't a fan of this idea, Broca,   but, honestly, this is our best option.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Oh, don't give me that look  , Broca.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If things don't go our way, all we gotta do is split.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hah... I don't think it's that simple, but he has a point.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: So how about it, Broca? Are you on board?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: ...I'll give it a try.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: You're finally awake.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Where are we...?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: The forest. Our team was attacked by a pack of beasts, and the two of us fell off the cliff. Remember now?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hmph, you're not very cute, are you?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Well, I still gotta thank you. If it wasn't for you, I might've   died there on the spot.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Don't mention it.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Aghhhhhhhh! Fine, okay! I'm sorry I picked that bone with you yesterday. I shouldn't have said that.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I'm a little testy  , you see. I don't like it when I hear someone badmouthing Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: But you're new here. It's not your fault you don't know what we're like just yet. Yato really tore me a new one last night. Don't take it personally, okay?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: No, I was at fault myself.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Eh, c'mon. I did you wrong, and I'll own up to that.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Anyway, let's put it behind us. That fine with you?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, that's a weight off my shoulders. It's been bothering me all day.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Where's everyone else?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: No idea. With their skills, I'm sure they can hold their own.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: We should look for them, then... Ugh.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hold up, bro. You shouldn't move around yet, what with how hurt you are.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: 'Bro?'
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Oh, that's just what I call everyone. It's more intimate. You don't have a problem with that, do you?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Call me whatever you want.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Alright, that settles it. Let's rest up here for the time being. We'll get moving once you heal up a bit.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Eh, don't worry. Yato's there with them. She's one of the most experienced operators we have. Nothing's gonna happen to them. Let's take care of ourselves.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, you lie down here a bit more. I'll take a look around.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: You know how loyal I am! Why are you abandoning me, Boss?!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: It's because you're loyal  , Broca.
All that loyalty, isn't it natural you'd die for me?
Yo, bro. Broca. I'm back.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I took a stroll around. This forest is huge. We gotta be a bit more careful.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: My wound's starting to get better. Let's move.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: You sure you don't want to rest a little more?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I'm good.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Right on, let's get moving, then. I have a decent idea of which way we came from.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Hey, bro, I've been wondering. What's with that saw on the back of your drill?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I don't see you using it much when you fight.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I use this when I do retrofitting work. It's for sawing wood, among other things.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Sawing wood? So you used to be a lumberjack or something?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: No, I wasn't. I just like crafting sometimes.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Heh, I didn't expect you to be the crafty kind.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: It's nothing that amazing.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, bro, I just noticed there's one more thing I'm wrong about you. When we left for this mission, I thought you were the type to keep to himself. I didn't know you could be so talkative.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: You should talk more. Try to express yourself if you don't want people to get the wrong idea. I mean, yesterday was the perfect example.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I actually mean it, though.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: You mean you don't trust Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Man, that's what I was talking about. You just got here, makes sense that you'd be a little iffy on the place.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Really, though, hear me out on this one. You really shouldn't talk like that. The first thing you said was 'I don't trust Rhodes Island.' What kind of impression do you think that gives the rest of us?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I don't...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Eh, stop right there, bro. I'm not trying to say you're hurting anyone's feelings or to tell you to shape up or anything. It's just, well, how should I say   this...?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: You see, I used to be a mercenary, and I've worked for organizations before, too. When I first got here, it was purely transactional. I was just here to make a living.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: They treat us well, and the food's not bad, but that's about it. If you'd asked me back then, I probably would've told you I don't believe in that good, charitable company bull crap.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I mean, all the big companies are basically the same. You feel the same way too, no?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: But anyway, I've been here for a while, and I can tell. Rhodes Island is different. This is something you need to learn yourself. Ain't nobody can teach you that.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: And yes, I trust Amiya, I trust the Doctor, and I trust Dr. Kal'tsit. They all won   me over.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I didn't snap because the way you were talking bugged me. I snapped because what you said was wrong. You know what I mean?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I'm not sure...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Eh, it's all good. I'm not telling you to figure it all out right now. What I'm trying to say is Rhodes Island isn't quite like what you think it is. You should try to trust in us a little more.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I don't remember helping out the village being part of our mission.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, that? It's actually the Captain's call. If he thinks we can manage it, in most cases, we try to do something to help the locals out.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Why bring that up all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: No reason...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Come on... Wait, bro.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Look.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Before the duo realize what has happened, the beasts that attacked the squad have already surrounded them.
Looks like we got   company.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I can still fight...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Don't. You haven't healed up yet. I'll create an opening for you. Run away when you get the chance.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I can't leave you behind.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hey, bro, you know why I apologized to you in the first place?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I wouldn't apologize even if Yato lectured me the whole night, but you shielded me when we got ambushed. That's when I knew you were a good guy.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Someone like you will come to like Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Anyway, I owe you this one.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Eh, bro, don't be so stubborn.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Relax. This is nothing. I ain't gonna die.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Broca simply stands there and lifts his weapon as though he didn't hear the operator's plea.
Eh, you really ain't cute at all.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I can let it slide though.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Alright, then. Stay close to me, bro. I got your back, and you got mine. We'll bust through these jackasses and make it out of here, together!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Just before the two of them could attack, a yelp can be heard from amongst the beasts.
Huh? Is that...?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Are you two okay?!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Oh, there you are! We're fine!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Hey, Broca, you don't look so good. Hurry. Sit down and let me take a look.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: That's Yato and the rest of the gang over there, right?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Yep, we've been looking for you two ever since you fell down there. It's such a relief to find you alive.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It looks like you're hanging in there okay. We can't let our guard down, though. Let's leave this place to the others and take Broca back first.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: No problem!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Huh? What was that?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: So how was your first field op, Broca?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: It was fine.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Really? Great. I was worried you'd end up starting a fight. I guess I shouldn't have worried.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Yeah, I think... I can give this a try.
attributes.name: Broca
